text: I wanted exactly the same thing today and got the same "NO" as an answer. we should be greatful that the new owners API at least gives you the TEAMS, but something as simple as showing the phone of the owner as a signature in a marketing email is impossible unless you do some black hat magic like saving users as contacts doing some processing to then check the owner and assign the owner's phone as a contact property of the "real contact" called "owners phone"
